name: MANGA (General) -Style LoRA Collection-
description:
Designed to make manga-like illustrations. Only trained on black and white illustrations.

Plan to update with more style versions in the future

READ VERSION NOTES FOR MORE INFO

modelVersions.name: v1.0 "Mature"
modelVersions.description:
• Notes

    • Has a more mature artstyle, something like Chainsaw Man or Death Note, rather than a more SOL "cute" style.

    • Reccomended to use Anything v4.5 or AbyssOrange2 for the intended results, but can look good with other models as well, just won't look as manga-like

    • I reccomend using a lower strength, like 0.40 - 0.60 paired with 'monochrome' and 'greyscale' for the best results.

    • Use mentioned keywords if color starts leaking.

  • Info

    • Trained with Trained with Anything v4.5

    • Image Set: 40

    • Training Resolution: 512x512
